title: Is this allowed?

replies.body:
It isn't allowed. It doesn't matter how many ppl report 1 player.
btw next time read the rules. §B3 "Abusing the report system (/report) will not be tolerated. Do not encourage others to report a specific player and do not repeatedly report the same user if a staff member has not attended to the report."

replies.body: It's not allowed as it's encouraging players to report someone for something they may not have/done .

replies.body: You are not allowed to say the specific hack, but you can say something like this, "You can use /report to report other players." That would be the better solution.
